metering: Matrix: 3D color matrix metering III (type G and D lenses), Center-weighted: Weight of 75% given to 12-mm circle in center of frame; diameter of circle can be changed to 8, 15 or 20 mm, Spot: Meters 4-mm circle (about 1.5% of frame)
exposurecompensation: -5 to +5 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
flashmodes: 1st Curtain Sync, Auto, Red-eye Reduction, Second-curtain Sync, Slow Sync, Slow Sync./Red-eye Reduction
fileformat: Still Images: JPEG, RAW, TIFF, Movies: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, MOV, Audio: Linear PCM
whitebalance: Auto (2), Incandescent, Fluorescent (7), Direct Sunlight, Flash, Cloudy, Shade, Preset Manual (4), Color Temperature (2,500K-10,000K); Fine-tuning available for all options
